hed: This Is the Butter-Smooth Pen That You've Probably Stolen from Brooklyn's Best Restaurants
body:
First things first: We don't condone stealing, not even pens from restaurants. That is bad. But if you feel *compelled* to steal a pen from a restaurant, possibly because signing the check feels so silky and your signature looks *so good* that you have to take a moment to just, *Oooooh*? That's natural. That's fine. And it's something we recently experienced at [Roman's](http://romansnyc.com/) in Brooklyn, which is part of the burgeoning Marlow & Son's empire. 

So: We put in a few calls, set aside our dignity, and were able to track down where a not-insignificant percentage of the best restaurants in the New York order their pens from. Behold:

[#image: /photos/55f34d3289c0d3e261b21c83]||||||

To get it, go to [BlueRibbonPremiums.net](http://www.blueribbonpremiums.net/) and search for the item # above. Gift the other 200 or so to your closest friends.
